As for those who lived to tell the tale...
In the end, something far more valuable has been taken...
Despite what they lost, there's still one thing that endures
Abandon an already sinking ship
Some still claim hearing of voices within. Of cries and wails that fill the nights...
When ignorance becomes a blessing...
Optimism is the only thing they can hold on to...
Even to this day, you can still hear their screams inside your head...
Choose a quiet life away from the rush and excitement you've dreamed of
Find your feet and stand on your own, after years of living in the shadow of someone else
Despite your strength, you know things will never be the same again...
Drown out the voices and the gruesome memories still lingering in your head
The good days come few and far in between now...
You have everything you've ever wanted in life, but at what cost?
For the first time in a long while, there's contentment

Anyone who sees them together won't deny seeing a different spark in their eyes

Find comfort in the last person you expect to recieve it from
